roadroller.ressourcemanager
Class RessourceManager

java.lang.Object
  roadroller.ressourcemanager.RessourceManager

public class RessourceManager
extends java.lang.Object

precaches resources which are frequently needed (eg. for enemy sprites) use the getters to retrieve the Images

Author:
Patrick, Felix
